mapper.select: SELECT sm.* FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id WHERE srm.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT sm.* FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.menu_type != 3

SELECT DISTINCT sm.PERMISSIONS FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id WHERE sm.PERMISSIONS IS NOT NULL AND sur.user_id = #{userId}
